title: Under the Green Light
summary: "I want to sculpt you into a form that never changes." In a city full of high-rise buildings, Mathew Rayner, a sculpture student who, aside from his art, lives isolated from the rest of the world. He unexpectedly meets a captivating man named Jin and feels a fated connection. Mathew offers him a proposal: be his model. Contrary to his intentions, the relationship between the two becomes more and more warped...In a grim world stained with dirty money and betrayal, Mathew steels his nerves as he approaches the executive of the Shinhae Faction, Jin Cheong-woo, and gives him a new ambition... "However, there are conditions: First, you must obey my words unconditionally." A man who built a wall between himself and the world, and another who looks down on the world, both concealing their true desires.

reviews.text:
(Tags: Drug abuse, gangs, dub-con in some chapters, power bottom)

AHHHH I LOVE UTGL ITS MY FAV MANHWA ğŸ˜

Jin is an amazing power bottom, I can't believe pathetic Codename fans are here leaving 1 stars because Jin is a power bottom like what. Jin is amazingly written too and I feel so bad for him and everything he was put through ğŸ˜­

Mathew is great as well, he's adorable, but also in the latest chapters (that aren't available on this site) he fuc*** up so bad, like why would you do that to Jin bro â˜¹ï¸

Also, no, Jin isn't a pedo, and there isn't grooming or anything, y'all just came from those TikTok's. Jin and Matt met when they were younger, but that doesn't mean Jin is a groomer because they didn't have romantic feelings for one another during that time, they only did years later when Matt was in his early 20's and they didn't even recognize each other ğŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸

I don't know why I love this Manhwa so much, maybe it's because the plot is somewhat unique and because of the main characters, but it's great!

Also the Dub-Con scene was...something! I don't blame Matt ofc because he was drugged. I just felt real bad for Jin, but it wasn't exactly Non-Con so it's Dub-Con

Anyway, 11/10, ITS A MASTERPIECE ğŸ˜

comments.name: Vic !
comments.text:
Â Characters/Relationship/Development 7.5/10
Â 
The characters shown in this manhwa were really well written, the development as well was a pretty huge huge rollercoaster which spiraled down from something to something gut wrenching and then to something good??? The only thing that ticks me off about the manhwa is the large age gap and the fact that Jin and Matt met when Matt was a lil kid, I'm fully aware that they never had any relationship until Jin and Matt were adults and Jin barely even remembered Matt as a kid but it's still a fact that sorta makes me uncomfortable? Btw don't attack me for this take, their relationship is completely legal and everything I just feel like I would've liked it better if they just made them both kids at the time or Jin slightly older and not a whole ten years. Still love them though. I also love how we have a power bottom who isn't at all effeminate or ANYTHING, he's actually REALLY MASCULINE.

(Won't let me out full thing again.)

reviews.name: han
reviews.text:
hello, this is a long review; so if you don't want to read.. feel free to scroll down to the other reviews!

under the green light is a masterpiece, and for me it is rare to see a bl that contains s** to have a genuine good story

to the artstyle, the story, the characters, its all great

i like how this bl wasn't just all about the s**, and that there is plot, unlike other bls. most bls nowadays just have s** on every chapter and i just cant stand reading it because there isnt even a story at that point

time to clear up confusion!

: "I think jin is a pedophile.. since he met matthew when he was just a kid"

- false! yes, they met when jin was was way older than matthew, and i do believe it is confirmed that as of now they have a 10 year age gap (jin, 34) (matthew, 24) that doesn't mean that this is pedophilia, or a "proship" why?Â 

because jin didnt fall in love with him during that time when they first met; when matthew was just a kid. clearly jin felt bad for matthew at the time and considered him like a little brother, though matthew (might) have fell in love with him during that time. that doesn't mean their feelings were mutual at the time,Â 

now, in the present. jin fell in love with matthew when he was already an adult. and the fact that he remembered matthew as the guy from the orphanage. doesn't mean he liked matthew when he was a kid

"but matthew was in love with jin since before!!"

again, this is not pedophilia, or grooming, because matthew was the only one with those feelings when he was a kid. jin did in fact remember matthew but that doesn't mean he liked him that way when they first met
1/2

comments.name: han
comments.text:
2.Â 

"i think matthew kind of raped jin, he's a horrible person i hate matthew!"

- this is not matthews fault, as he was drugged and didn't know what he was doingÂ 

i'm not saying this to excuse ra**, just let me finish

jin just let it happen, he held onto it because he knew this wasn't matthew, and that his boy would never do this

it was a little rapey, but i believe that matthew is genuinely sorry and he didn't mean to do that, and in fact jin told him not to apologize, and even didn't consider it as ra**

comments.name: han
comments.text:
@han

extra to my clearing up

"since they met when jin was 24 and matthew was 14 (just an estimate) wouldn't that be considered pedophilia? Because now they are dating and jin saw matthew as just a kid"

no it is not, why? hear me out first. jin did not have any romantic feelings at that time while matthew did. this isn't pedophilia because jin never suggested they should be in a relationship that time, he only talked to him and comforted him. matthew fell in love but that doesn't mean jin did at the time

i've seen some people dislike this because they think that jin is a groomer/pedophle but they just don't seem to understand how logic works

if you meet someone when they were younger, never had any romantic intentions and then later dating them because you fell in love with them when they were an adult. would that be wrong?

no, because you fell in love with them when they are legal, you did not have feelings for them when they were a minor

also if you thought that jin liked matthew ever since they "first met" (when matthew was just a kid) because of that panel where he suddenly remembered that the "potato" kid was matthew, no..

he just loved matthew even more because he found out he was the potato kid, not that he fell in love with matthew when he was a kid, he felt a much more stronger connection with matthew because he was the potato kid; that one kid that he wanted to protect.Â 


in conclusion: jin is not a pedo because he didn't have romantic feelings for matthew when he was just a kid

: hopefully the people who think that won't misunderstand anymore

little correction to my review, the first comment. jin probably did not see him as a little brother, he just felt bad for him and wanted to make him feel like he was understood and noticed

reviews.name: Clozabel
reviews.text:
I really like this one; it's got everything - Great story, wonderful art style and very hot s** scenes!

The storyline is interesting. It's gangster-based so there is violence, but it's not gratuitous. The backstories of the main characters are explained well and generally their character development is good. The side characters are also intriguing, which I find is rare in yaoi. There is enough of a build up of the story in season 1 (and not just the cliffhanger ending!) that sets up season 2 and makes you want to read more.

The romance plot is good too - I like it when both characters are chasing each other and it's not just one-sided. The gangster is the uke - he's a badass and a true power bottom. The seme is a bit clueless at first but he soon learns! They are very into each other and this is portayed well.Â 

The art style is amazing - Some people might not like the comicbook-esque textures used but I liked it. Drawing is consistent so far. The s** scenes are very hot - they're not overly long or obscenely vulgar; they are just the right amount of graphic, lustful and heartfelt. I like that both the seme and uke are well-built men - they are both tall and muscled and the height/size difference isn't overly exaggerated like in some (lesser) manga.

Translations are generally good for season one - there are more refined ones out there though if you care to look for them. Fan translations on more recent chapters are abysmal! I can barely tell what's happening. I'll be waiting for the officials before I revisit season 2 I think.Â 

Overall it's a very, very good example of yaoi done well. I would definitely recommend giving this a go. The only reason I haven't given 5 stars is that I need to see what happens in season 2/to the end to give a final judgement.

reviews.text:
I devoured it in one go! Too bad it only has so few chapters so far, but maybe there's more to come?

I thought I fell for Mr. Mookya from 'the words in your snare', but okay, so Jin got me a lot harder. Haaa I like these bad guys in suits, I like his eyes too. Always dark, always tired, always too sharp, very se**. But I also like Matt, the badly traumatized boy who learned very quickly that feeling is an access to himself and that he can be hurt because it means weakness. He shuts himself off and only shows his expression in his art, I know the feeling.

Hopefully this story will continue to be written and illustrated, clear reading recommendation, very great story. No typical mafia guy meets Normalo and both adapt to each other stuff, but something with depth and heart!

reviews.name: StardustLullaby
reviews.text:
MAJOR RA** WARNING!!!

Season 1 = 5 stars, no... 20 stars. It was literally just that good. I was so looking forward to season 2. Waited over a year for it.

Season 2... Can suck my a** while I jump from a plane without a parachute into a volcano. The entire first chunk of season 2 is literally just violent R@PE. Painful, choking, bleeding r@pe. Between the main characters. Multiple chapters of it. What the fu** was the author thinking!? And then just as soon as it's over it's just the typical bullsh!t of "oh no that wasn't r@pe, let's be in an actual relationship now" WHAT THE FÃ›CK!!? Author clearly sold out. The vibe of season 2 doesn't even match season 1, the ra** is so out of place.

NO NEED TO CALL ME NAMES I KNOW YOU HATE ME but...
But still, at this point I have to say it out loud, or it will kill me....

The more I see, the less I like you, Matthew, you're not a good guy, not at all, there's nothing likable about you AT ALL, you're just a walking red flag. I would run from you. Really. You're not a lovebird but just a dangerously obsessed mf, who has zero moral, pretty annoying attitude, and... you know, a very, VERY creepy vibe in general.
I really like psychos but I would literally just turn around and run from you as fast as I can.Â 

Â 

And you, Brandon.., It's such a waste to be the "bad guy", you're not a bad guy at all, you _become_ one for a reason, but you never learn how to handle it, that's why you're so lonely and untrustworthy and sad and it breaks my heart, that's why you missed your chances even with jin and fuc*** up everything every single time, and now just... it's just too late for you.

You should have quit ages ago and everything would be fine, and I know you know it, you always knew it, that's why it's so painful to me too, you poor soul, you poor, poor soul...

I don't even wanna imagine the pain you had to live with, so please, just... die, okay? Like, you know, in peace. No more regrets, no more ruins, just a little nap. Okay? I really don't wanna see you in prison or agony, and especially not live your miserable life any longer. Death is a friend of all of us, not an enemy. So just don't come out from there.

Do it for me, you deserve a long-looong nap after all of this sh**....

Â 

...And Jin, if you really want this, then fine, whatever, if you're really that dumb... but don't come to me later crying when you realize that your sweet little puppy is just born psycho wardog that bit you every time you wanna leave the basement...

ComeÂ  to me only when you fially decided to get rid of him, and then I'll help you.

comments.name: Turn to Christ
comments.text:
Yk what, since turning to Christ. I can no longer read this.
Though many may not realize, this is demonic in it's own sense.
The Devil tempts men and women different (Women being over 90% of yaoi readers)
One way the Devil temps women is through these "romance" yaois.
You divulge into the romance because you like the idea of love being behind the s**. But that is not right. This is the same thing as a PO** addiction. Because it is a po** addiction. Maybe it feels different, and maybe you may think such feelings are normal. That is Satan's work. Satan's goal true goal, is not to just make us lustful. It is to drive us so far from Christ through the normalization of sin. So far, that we can never come apart from the world of sin.
Satan is holding the rope of sin, and you are helping him tie that rope around your neck, to ultimately hang you. The time Satan takes ahold of you fully, you will be no more than an empty shell of what you were.
Your thoughts will cease, and you will no longer be yourself.Â 
I am saying this because I wish all of you the best, and I hope by spreading this message all of you will begin to learn just how horrible a sin this really is.
G** tells us this to improve our life's.Â 
G**'s words are calming, comforting, convicting, encouraging, leading, loving, reassuring, still, and quite.
Satan's words are addicting, obsessing, worrying, condemning, discouraging, confusing, pushing, frightening, rushing, and lies.
Do not make the mistake
Let go of the sinful lu** and convert to religion. Jesus is waiting for you all with open arms.
And my heart really goes out to you all. I really feel sadness in my heart to see this happen to you guys. You are all such wonderful people, please don't let this happen to yourself.
